channel.title: Light Tank on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Light Tank on Home

item.title: Tier I Light Tanks
item.description: All the graphs are based on battles played during update 6.0 only (not cumulative data). The Best Performing Tanks Relative WR The graph shows Light Tanks by Relative WR. That is the average of players’ WR in a tank compared to their average WR at the tier (in all same tier tanks).

item.title: Tier I Light Tanks
item.description: All the graphs are based on battles played during update 6.1 only (not cumulative data). The Best Performing Tanks Relative WR The graph shows Light Tanks by Relative WR. That is the average of players’ WR in a tank compared to their average WR at the tier (in all same tier tanks).
